metadata.title: CVE-2022-4135 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in GPU in Google Chrome prior to 107.0.5304.121allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
